alert.note: Alert for Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 12 at 8:29AM CDT until March 12 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN TALLAPOOSA COUNTY... At 829 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jacksons` Gap, or near Dadeville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Dadeville, Jacksons` Gap, New Site, Northern Lake Martin, Wind Creek State Park, Eastern Lake Martin, Daviston, Dare Park, Eagle Creek, Horseshoe Bend and Horseshoe Bend National Military Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
